From: Betty NbKenzie, Publications Editor
Date: April 10, 1961
At the Publications Committee meting in Columbus, one of the things
on which the committee will need to make a recoimaendation to the NAEB
Board is on whether or not the Newsletter should be made into a month,
ly magazine* Attached is a short suismary of ay views on the subject
which you might wish to think about prior to the committee meeting*
For those of you who will not be present, we would appreciate having
your views beforehand* Thank you*
